scopecontent.p: Contains records, 1989-2011, of the Virgina State Lottery Dept. relating to Lady Luck. Lady Luck was a character played by Melanie MacQueen and was used by the Virginia Lottery in television and print commercials, as well as in-person events, from 1990 to 2013. There are videos of commercials, scripts of commercials, photographs, clippings, promotional material, scrapbooks, and other material relating to the activities of Lady Luck.
